name: Mouse And Cheese Tactics
description:
A gluten free action game !

Eat the cheese ! Avoid the traps !

An old school arcade mini game for those who love retro games.

Controls:

Move Left: A, Left Arrow. 

Move Right: D, Right Arrow.

Jump: Space.

START: Enter, Space.

Quit: ESC.

The game should also work with an Xbox Controller.

If you have enjoyed the game, I'd appreciate your support by buying me a coffee too ! Thanks !
